Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: simplify project structure and add i18n support

Simplified monorepo structure and organized LLM context docs

Major Changes:
- Removed workspace structure (extension/package.json)
- Consolidated to single package.json at root
- All scripts run directly from root (pnpm dev, pnpm build)
- Build output: extension/ → dist/

LLM Context Organization:
- Created docs/llm-context/ for AI development references
- Moved all spec docs to dedicated folder:
  - PRD.txt, CLAUDE.MD, COMET DOM specs
  - Supabase rules and API contracts
  - LemonSqueezy integration docs
- Added docs/llm-context/README.md with usage guidelines
- Updated .gitignore to exclude llm-context from distribution

i18n Support:
- Added multi-language support (English & Korean)
- English as primary development language
- Updated CLAUDE.md with English content
- Added VITE_DEFAULT_LANG env variable

Configuration Updates:
- Added vite.config.ts for proper build pipeline
- Updated env variables to use VITE_ prefix (Vite requirement)
- Improved package.json scripts:
  - Added lint:fix, format:check
  - Updated pack to include build step
  - Simplified clean script
- Added vite-plugin-static-copy for assets

File Structure:
- extension/src/ → source code
- dist/ → build output (git-ignored)
- docs/llm-context/ → LLM reference docs (git-ignored)
- agent_docs/ → developer documentation
- tests/ → test files

Breaking Changes:
- Environment variables now require VITE_ prefix
- Extension package.json removed (use root)
- Build output moved from extension/dist/ to dist/

Milestone: M1
Features: project-init (structure refinement)
EOF
)")
